name: Accurate
description: Increases attack check bonus by +2 per rank of this modifier. Max ranks of this modifier cannot provide a bonus greater than the power's rank.

name: Affects Corporeal
description: Allows an effect that normally only affects insubstantial targets (like Insubstantial itself used offensively) to affect corporeal targets. Effect rank against corporeal targets equals rank of this extra.

name: Affects Insubstantial
description: Effect works on insubstantial beings. Costs +1 flat point for half effect against insubstantial targets, or +2 flat points for full effect (chosen via parameter).

name: Affects Objects (Also)
description: Allows a Fortitude resisted effect that normally only affects creatures to also affect inanimate objects. +1 PP/rank.

name: Affects Objects (Only)
description: Allows a Fortitude resisted effect to affect *only* inanimate objects, not creatures. This is effectively a +0 cost modifier (Affects Objects +1/rank combined with Limited to Objects -1/rank).

name: Affects Others (Also)
description: Allows a Personal range effect to be used on others by touch, while still usable on self. +1 PP/rank.

name: Affects Others (Only)
description: Allows a Personal range effect to be used *only* on others by touch, not on self. +0 PP/rank.

name: Alternate Effect (Static)
description: Allows a power to have one or more alternative effects, chosen when the power is used. Only one effect in a static array can be active at a time. Each AE slot costs 1 PP.

name: Alternate Effect (Dynamic)
description: Allows a power to have dynamic alternate effects. Points from the base power's cost can be allocated among any of its DAEs. Each DAE slot costs 2 PP.

name: Alternate Resistance
parameter_prompt: Select New Resistance and Cost Implication (GM's Call for 'Harder')
parameter_secondary_prompt: Cost implication for chosen Alternate Resistance:
description: Effect uses a different resistance check. User/GM determines if new resistance is equivalent/easier (+0 PP/rank) or harder (+1 PP/rank) than the original. Select the new resistance and the cost implication.

name: Area (Burst)
description: Effect targets a sphere (burst) with radius based on Area rank (Distance Rank of Area Rank - 2, e.g., Area Rank 0 = 5ft radius). No attack check needed; targets get Dodge check (DC 10 + Area Rank) for half effect. Max Effect Rank = PL.

name: Area (Cloud)
description: Sphere, like Burst, but the effect lingers for 1 round after initial use. Radius Rank - 2 for distance. (DHH: Cloud area costs +2/rank total vs. non-Area).

name: Area (Cone)
description: Cone shape, length & base width based on Area rank (Distance Rank of Area Rank, e.g., Area Rank 0 = 15ft cone). Dodge DC 10 + Area Rank.

name: Area (Cylinder)
description: Cylinder shape, radius based on Area Rank -2 (like Burst), height based on Area Rank (like Cone). Dodge DC 10 + Area Rank.

name: Area (Line)
description: Line shape, length based on Area Rank, fixed width (typically 5 feet). Dodge DC 10 + Area Rank.

name: Area (Perception - Attack)
parameter_prompt: Perception Sense Type for Area (e.g., Visual, Auditory)
description: Attack targets all subjects able to perceive the target of the attack (not the user) with the chosen sense type. No attack check. Max effect rank = PL. Cost +1/rank if power is already Ranged, or +2/rank if power was Close.

name: Area (Perception - General Effect)
parameter_prompt: Perception Sense Type for Area (e.g., Visual, Auditory for non-attack effect)
description: Non-attack effect targets all subjects able to perceive its origin point with the chosen sense type. Max effect rank = PL. Cost +1/rank.

name: Area (Shapeable)
description: Effect fills a volume that can be shaped by the user, based on Area rank (Volume Rank of Area Rank + 2, e.g., Area Rank 0 = 30 cubic feet). Dodge DC 10 + Area Rank.

name: Attack (Action Change)
description: Allows a normally Personal effect to be used on others as an attack (Close by default). +0 PP/rank, as it usually also gains a resistance check. If the original Personal effect was Perception range (like Mind Reading), this can make it a Ranged or Perception attack.

name: Contagious
description: Effect can spread to others who come into contact with the original target (or its lingering effect). Target resists Contagious effect with same defense as original. +1 PP/rank.

name: Dimensional (Travel)

parameter_options.label: Group of Related Dimensions (2 PP total)

description: Allows a movement effect (like Teleport) to travel to other dimensions. Cost 1-3 flat PP based on chosen scope rank of this modifier.

name: Dimensional (Affect)

parameter_options.label: Affect Single Other Dimension (1 PP total)
Affect Group of Related Dimensions (2 PP total)

description: Allows an effect to affect targets in other dimensions. Cost 1-3 flat PP based on chosen scope rank of this modifier.

name: Extended Range
description: Doubles a ranged effect's distances per rank of this modifier (each rank reduces range penalty by 1). 1 flat PP per rank of Extended Range.

name: Feature (Power)
parameter_prompt: Describe the minor capability or benefit this power provides per rank
description: Adds a minor capability or benefit to an effect, not worth a full power effect on its own. 1 flat PP per rank (per feature).

name: Homing
description: Attack effect gains additional chances to hit if it misses (1 extra attack attempt per rank of Homing, in subsequent rounds). 1 flat PP per rank of Homing.

name: Impervious
description: Resistance (usually Toughness) ignores effects with rank half Impervious rank or less (rounded up). +1 PP per rank of Impervious applied.

name: Increased Duration (Concentration)
description: Changes an Instant duration effect to Concentration duration (+1 PP/rank). Requires a standard action each round to maintain.

name: Increased Duration (Sustained)
description: Changes a Concentration duration effect to Sustained duration (+1 PP/rank). Requires a free action each round to maintain. (If from Instant, total +2 PP/rank for both steps).

name: Increased Duration (Continuous)
description: Changes a Sustained duration effect to Continuous duration (+1 PP/rank). Effect remains until turned off (free action) or countered, no action to maintain.

name: Increased Mass
description: Effect can carry/affect more mass. Each rank of this modifier increases the mass rank the power can affect by 1 (see Measurements Table). 1 flat PP per rank of Increased Mass.

name: Increased Range (Close to Ranged)
description: Changes a Close or Touch range effect to Ranged (+1 PP/rank).

name: Increased Range (Personal to Close/Touch)
description: Changes a Personal range effect to Close/Touch range (+1 PP/rank). This often overlaps with Affects Others.

name: Increased Range (Ranged to Perception)
description: Changes a Ranged effect to Perception range (+1 PP/rank). No attack check needed.

name: Incurable
description: Effect cannot be countered or removed by Healing or Regeneration (unless they have the Persistent extra). +1 flat PP.

name: Indirect
parameter_prompt: Select type of Indirectness for the attack's origin

parameter_options.label: Fixed Point, Not Through Cover (1 PP)
Any Point, Not Through Cover (2 PP)

description: Effect can originate from a point other than the user, bypassing cover depending on selected rank of this modifier. 1 flat PP per rank (1-4 ranks for increasing indirectness).

name: Innate
description: Effect is a natural part of you and cannot be Nullified (though its effects might be countered by other powers). +1 flat PP.

name: Insidious
description: The result of the effect is more difficult to detect. Target needs a Perception or Insight check (DC 10 + effect rank) to realize they were affected or by what. +1 flat PP.

name: Linked Effect
parameter_prompt: Select another Power effect to Link with this one
description: Two or more effects activate together as a single action. Both effects must have the same range. Total cost is the sum of the linked effects. This modifier is applied to one of the effects, and the linked power is specified.

name: Multiattack
description: Allows an attack effect to hit multiple targets with penalties, or a single target for increased effect on very successful hits. +1 PP/rank.

name: Penetrating (Damage)
description: Damage effect overcomes Impervious Resistance. Each rank of Penetrating overcomes 1 rank of Impervious. 1 flat PP per rank of Penetrating.

name: Precise (Effect)
description: Effect can perform delicate and precise tasks it normally couldn't (e.g., Create making intricate objects, Move Object for fine manipulation). +1 flat PP.

name: Reach (Melee)
description: Extend a close or touch range effect's reach by 5 feet per rank of this modifier. 1 flat PP per rank of Reach.
